Maven Mojo - Talend Job Builder
Last Published: 2017-06-23  | Version: 6.4.1
Maven Mojo - Talend Job Builder
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

ci.builder:local-generate

Full name:

org.talend:ci.builder:6.4.1:local-generate

Description:

Use the commandline script mode to generate job sources.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: generate-sources.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
commandlineWorkspace String - Commandline workspace directory.
User property is: commandline.workspace.
productPath String - Commandline product directory.
User property is: product.path.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
commandlineUser String - Commandline login user.
Default value is: jobbuilder@talend.com.
User property is: commandline.user.
deployVersion String - Specify project version for all poms. If not set, the commandline product version will be used.
User property is: deploy.version.
itemFilter String - Filter for the items to build.
User property is: itemFilter.
jvmArguments String - JVM arguments
Default value is: -ea -Xms512m -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 -Xmx2000m -XX:+CMSClassUnloadingEnabled -XX:MinHeapFreeRatio=10 -XX:MaxHeapFreeRatio=20 -XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError.
User property is: jvm.arguments.
launcherPath String - Commandline launcher path. Set up this parameter if using a different launcher version.
Default value is: ${product.path}/plugins/org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.3.0.v20140415-2008.jar.
User property is: launcher.path.
projectsTargetDirectory String - Directory of generated projects sources.
Default value is: ${basedir}/projectSources.
User property is: projectsTargetDirectory.

Parameter Details

commandlineUser:

Commandline login user.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: commandline.user
  • Default: jobbuilder@talend.com

commandlineWorkspace:

Commandline workspace directory.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: commandline.workspace

deployVersion:

Specify project version for all poms. If not set, the commandline product version will be used.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: deploy.version

itemFilter:

Filter for the items to build.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: itemFilter

jvmArguments:

JVM arguments
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: jvm.arguments
  • Default: -ea -Xms512m -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 -Xmx2000m -XX:+CMSClassUnloadingEnabled -XX:MinHeapFreeRatio=10 -XX:MaxHeapFreeRatio=20 -XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError

launcherPath:

Commandline launcher path. Set up this parameter if using a different launcher version.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: launcher.path
  • Default: ${product.path}/plugins/org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.3.0.v20140415-2008.jar

productPath:

Commandline product directory.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: product.path

projectsTargetDirectory:

Directory of generated projects sources.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: projectsTargetDirectory
  • Default: ${basedir}/projectSources
